sense.def:
A path
je ozek pas tal, po katerem ljudje hodijo, da pridejo do določenega cilja.
sense.QP:
glej slikovno prilogo
HOUSE AND FLAT
.

seg.quote: He went up the path to his front door.

sense.def:
One's path
je prostor pred človekom, ko gre proti določenemu cilju.

seg.quote: On arrival he found his path barred.
It moves forward killing anything in its path.

sense.def:
The path of something
je črta, po kateri se nekaj premika v določeno smer.

seg.quote: The flight path of the 747 carried it directly overhead.

sense.def:
A path
je ukrepanje v določeni smeri, po kateri želimo doseči zastavljeni cilj.

seg.quote: He saw public ownership as one of many paths to achieving a socialist society.
